itunes:title: Episode 610 - DB Sports Companion Show 06/02/20 - Special Guest Former Minnesota Vikings Cornerback Fred Smoot
title: Episode 610 - DB Sports Companion Show 06/02/20 - Special Guest Former Minnesota Vikings Cornerback Fred Smoot
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome former professional football cornerback Fred Smoot to discuss his long career in the NFL while playing for The Redskins and the Minnesota Vikings, clears the air surrounding his involvement in the Love Boat Scandal...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome former professional football cornerback Fred Smoot to discuss his long career in the NFL while playing for The Redskins and the Minnesota Vikings, clears the air surrounding his involvement in the Love Boat Scandal, explains why there needs to be a Waffle House near every strip club, the guys talk about what life is going to be like on the Patriots team without Tom Brady, and the three imagine the craziness of a sports team with Fred Smoot and Dennis Rodman on it.

Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy
